name: Clujotronic 2020 - Gamelin
description:
WebGL doesn't work, download the file.

You are a vampire tired to have to keep on the safe, dark, side of their planet. A portal whisks you away through the universe, in search for a suitable environment.

Move on the planets with the right and left arrows. Boost your jump with Space and launch on release. Make your way to the portals.

Press TAB zoom-out and R to restart the level.

--------

Casual Game Sounds

Fantom Music
